info.description:
Maxxton Microservice main class for resource-service.

 Maxxton Group 2015
info.title: resource-service

get.description:
Get resources together with their representationId based on distributionchannelId.
 Required filter fields: resourceIds, distributionchannelIds.
Get all Activities, if a filter is provided, only those Activities matching the filter criteria
Get a single accommodationKind by id

default.description: The AccommodationKind matching the Id or null

get.description: Get all Specials, if a filter is provided, only those Specials matching the filter criteria
Get all AccommodationTypes, if a filter is provided, only those AccommodationTypes matching the filter criteria
Get all ResourceActivities, if a filter is provided, only those ResourceActivities matching the filter criteria
Get all Compositions, if a filter is provided, only those Compositions matching the filter criteria
Get a Resource matching the resourceId
Get all Products, if a filter is provided, only those Products matching the filter criteria
Get all Extras, if a filter is provided, only those Extras matching the filter criteria
Get all Resources, if a filter is provided, only those Resources matching the filter criteria
